00047 template<class E, class V>
00048 class SUMOAbstractRouter {
00049 public:
00054     class ROAbstractEdgeEffortRetriever {
00055     public:
00057         ROAbstractEdgeEffortRetriever() { }
00058 
00060         virtual ~ROAbstractEdgeEffortRetriever() { }
00061 
00063         virtual SUMOReal getEffort(const V* const, SUMOTime time, const E* const edge,
00064                                    SUMOReal dist) const = 0;
00065 
00067         virtual const std::string& getID() const = 0;
00068 
00069     };
00070 
00071 
00072 public:
00074     SUMOAbstractRouter() { }
00075 
00077     virtual ~SUMOAbstractRouter() { }
00078 
00081     virtual void compute(const E* from, const E* to, const V* const vehicle,
00082                          SUMOTime msTime, std::vector<const E*> &into) = 0;
00083 
00084     virtual SUMOReal recomputeCosts(const std::vector<const E*> &edges,
00085                                     const V* const v, SUMOTime msTime) const = 0;
00086 
00087 };
00088 
00089 
00090 template<class E, class V>
00091 struct prohibited_withRestrictions {
00092 public:
00093     inline bool operator()(const E* edge, const V* vehicle) const {
00094         if (std::find(myProhibited.begin(), myProhibited.end(), edge) != myProhibited.end()) {
00095             return true;
00096         }
00097         return edge->prohibits(vehicle);
00098     }
00099 
00100     void prohibit(const std::vector<E*> &toProhibit) {
00101         myProhibited = toProhibit;
00102     }
00103 
00104 protected:
00105     std::vector<E*> myProhibited;
00106 
00107 };
00108 
00109 template<class E, class V>
00110 struct prohibited_noRestrictions {
00111 public:
00112     inline bool operator()(const E*, const V*) const {
00113         return false;
00114     }
00115 };
